name: Spa Suite
description: 600 square feet of luxury with an in-room jetted Jacuzzi tub for the ultimate relaxation. Access the exclusive 25th floor Concierge Lounge with complimentary continental breakfast and afternoon hors d'oeuvres. Features custom furnishings, floor-to-ceiling windows with dramatic Sierra views, 55-inch HDTV, Bose Wave Radio with iPod docking, and butler service available upon request.
shortDescription: 600 sq ft suite with in-room Jacuzzi, Concierge Lounge access, and Sierra views.

meta.title: Spa Suite – Atlantis Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Book the Spa Suite at Atlantis Reno – 600 sq ft with in-room Jacuzzi, Concierge Lounge, and Sierra Nevada views.

testimonials.quote: Visited Spa Suite during our golf trip and it was a great addition to the itinerary. Nice change of pace from the courses. GTHS really knows how to round out a trip with the right activities.
testimonials.author: Matt W.

testimonials.quote: Spa Suite was a fun surprise on our trip. Perfect for the non-golfers and honestly the golfers enjoyed it too. Reno has so much more than just great courses.
testimonials.author: Diego J.
